subject: Public Speaking
title: The Hook: First 30 Seconds
description: A fast breakdown of The Hook: First 30 Seconds for builders.

hook.text: If they don't care in 30 seconds, they won't care about anything.

buildup.text: Your opening must be interesting, relevant, and signal importance.

discovery.text: A surprising stat, personal story, question, or bold claim grabs.

twist.text: Once grabbed, the next sentence must make them curious to stay.

climax.text: The hook determines if audiences commit or mentally check out.

punchline.text: Hook them first. Teach them after.

quiz.question: What should a strong opening do?
